title: Hygloss Products Blank Books for Journaling, Sketching, Writing and More for Arts and Crafts-Softcover, 24 Pages, 4.25 x 5.5 Inches, 24 Pack, White
description: These colorful blank books have 24 blank pages (12 sheets and 24 sides) each and they come 24 books to a pack. Each pocket-size booklet measures 4.25 x 5.5 inches. These bright blank books are great for journaling, drawing, sketching and creative writing. The covers of these blank notebooks come in white and are crafted from sturdy, colored card stock. They look great on their own or they can be fun to decorate with glitter, glue, paint or other creative collage materials. These colorful blank notebooks are great for all ages to express their creative side using a fun, top-quality writing book. The pages are made from white bond paper for durability. Also available in other colors and sizes. Hygloss Colorful Blank Books are proudly made in the USA. We offer unrivaled quality at a great price. If for any reason you are unsatisfied, we’ll make it right for you!
